snippet: Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal both will be expected to beat much lower-ranked opponents in the second round of the French Open on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal both will be expected to beat much lower-ranked opponents in the second round of the French Open on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: French Open Lookahead: Djokovic, Nadal Seek Milestone Wins
headline.main: French Open Lookahead: Djokovic, Nadal Seek Milestone Wins
